dmca.title: MCQE complains of posted questions
dmca.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,

 The questions posted at "Free Mccee Questions 0001?2955" at:
http://mccee-sample-questions.blogspot.com
are textually taken from a previous edition of our MCQE program. This is a violation of our intellectual propriety and a violation of copyright law, these questions belong to our program. 

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate, and that I am the copyright owner or am  authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[Signature]
Mcqe Program Administrator,
Medical Education Database Inc.
[private]@mcqe.net
http://www.mcqe.net
